dataList.name: Sin Nullification
dataList.desc: Unless this unit is Staggered or Part Broken, take 80% less [Combustion] damage.

dataList.name: Proliferating Flame
dataList.desc: If the target has [Combustion]: On Hit, spread half of [Combustion] on target to 2 units adjacent to the target on the Dashboard.

dataList.name: Chaotic Hunt
dataList.desc:
Clash Win: Clash Power -1 for the next Clash (max 2)
Clash Lose: Clash Power +1 for the next Clash (max 2)

dataList.name: Humanity Abandoned
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain 2 [AttackDmgUp].

dataList.name: Sack
dataList.desc:
- When this unit has the Chain, all Parts gain 1 [Enhancement] and 2 [AttackDmgUp]
- When the Chain is broken, starting next turn, gain 2 [Binding] and +0.7 to all physical resistances until the end of this Encounter

dataList.name: Ressentiment
dataList.desc: When this unit has 35% or less HP: If the target has a higher HP percentage than this unit, Clash Power +2

dataList.name: Spite-driven
dataList.desc:
If this Unit's current HP percentage is 30% or less:
- Blunt Skills Deal +20% more damage
- Gain 1 [Enhancement] and 2 [Vulnerable] with every turn that passes. (3 times max)

dataList.name: Infernal Hound
dataList.desc:
When the Chain is broken, inflict [AaCfPcBg] to a random enemy.
Starting next turn, prioritize target with [AaCfPcBg].

dataList.name: Superiority
dataList.desc: Clash Win: If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, heal 3 SP

dataList.name: The Uninvited
dataList.desc:
If there are Staggered enemies, this unit prioritizes Staggered targets with its Attack Skills
Deal +20% more damage to Staggered enemies On Hit

dataList.name: Receiving Arts 9: Binding
dataList.desc: After this unit gains a new pattern, and after Combat End, inflict [AaCfPcBc] to a random Identity without [AaCfPcBc] next turn

dataList.name: Release From Binds
dataList.desc: All [AaCfPcBc] less than or equal to 2 expires when this unit is Staggered

dataList.name: Spreading Emotions
dataList.desc:
When an ally with the same Affinity to this unit's Explosive Emotions effect is defeated: lose Explosive Emotions effect on self, kill all other allies, and gain [AaCfPbBd] next turn.
All Sinners gain the effects of the corresponding Explosive Emotions effect, and protection against the corresponding Affinity.

dataList.name: Amalgamated Resentment
dataList.desc:
When this unit has an Explosive Emotions effect, all Skill Affinities are replaced with the corresponding Affinity.
Even after the Explosive Emotions effect expires, the changed Skill Affinities remain changed for the rest of the Phase.

dataList.name: Continuing Revenge
dataList.desc:
Gains a new pattern at 75% and 35% of max HP.
When this unit gains a new pattern, halve the Potency and Count of every negative effect on self

dataList.name: Self-loathing
dataList.desc:
All Skills target Heathcliff.
This unit wins the Encounter if Heathcliff dies. (Allied defeat)

dataList.name: Antagonism
dataList.desc: If the target's current HP is higher than this unit's, Clash Power +2 and deal +20% more damage

dataList.name: Long-awaited Moment
dataList.desc:
Clash Win: Heal 5 SP on self
Clash Lose against Heathcliff: Lose 5 SP and gain 2 [Binding] next turn. (Once per turn)
If this unit did not land a single hit against Heathcliff this turn, lose 5 SP at Turn End

dataList.name: Vying Spirit
dataList.desc:
The lower this unit's HP gets, the higher this unit's Defense Level gets
Defense Level +1 for every 10% missing HP on self (rounded down)

dataList.name: Heart of Vengeance
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: If not at -45 SP, heal 15 SP.
Turn End: If Panicked, recover from Panic at the next Turn Start and reset SP to 0.
Turn End: If this unit recovers from Panic, gain 2 [Enhancement] at the next Turn Start

dataList.name: Wild Hunt of Desolation
dataList.desc: Cannot be defeated at 0 HP. HP does not drop below 1.

dataList.name: A Distant Identity
dataList.desc: Turn End: If both Hands are at 1 HP, become Immobilized.

dataList.name: Cold Body
dataList.desc: HP does not drop below 1.

dataList.name: A Shaky Ego
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If both Hands are at 1 HP, gain Shield next turn.
Once the Shield is fully depleted, become Immobilized.

dataList.name: Misery-severing Hand
dataList.desc: If the other Hand is at 2+ HP at the next Turn End after the turn in which this Hand reaches 1 HP, this unit heals HP equal to 50% of the other Hand's HP. (rounded down)

dataList.name: Deep Bereavement
dataList.desc: Become Staggered as long as this unit's HP is at 1. The HP does not drop below 1.

dataList.name: Broken Heart
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: If there is a Hand with 2+ HP, gain 10 [Protection], and all Resistance values become 0.2.
Turn Start: If both Hands are at 1 HP, [Protection] expires, and all Resistance values revert to default values.

dataList.name: For Every Heathcliff
dataList.desc:
When Clashing against Heathcliff, Clash Power -3 and deal -50% less damage against Heathcliff
Wins Encounter if Heathcliff dies
